user_question: How does a solar panel work, and can you provide a diagram of a simple solar panel system?
final_answer: A solar panel works by allowing photons, or particles of light, to knock electrons free from atoms, generating a flow of electricity. Diagram of a simple solar panel system generated. Solar panels are typically made from silicon cells, metal frames, glass casing, and wiring.
